fault helped art part may helped art superfluous finger usually grow thumbe little finger seldome otherwise either wholly fleshy bone kind nailes upon bony nature doe either arise joint naturall together quitture besides ligament strengthened cicatrization loosenesse helped meanes whole part notably corroberated chap xxiiii flatulent convulsion convulsive contraction commonly called french goute grampe english crampe french call goute grampe wee heare intend treat induced thereto rather affinity name thing cr mp one speake truly certaine kinde convulsion generated flatulent matter violence whose running downe motion ofttimes necke armes leg either extended contracted great paine short time cause thereof grosse tough vapor insinuating selfe branch nerve cause thereof membrane muscle take one night rather day heat spirit usually retire entrailes center body whence flatulency may bee generated fill distend pull part whereinto runne wee see lutestrings extended affect often aristolochia enula campana iris caepa scylla sigillum salomonis sigillum beatae mariae bryonia panis porcinus dracunculus asphodelus origanum mentha pulegium sabina serpillum calamentha hyssopus oxycratum vinum vetus aut aromaticum mel aqua vitae muria adeps tauri equi leonis canis hirci medulla cervi cruris bovis arietis ammoniacum galbanum opopanax sagapenum myrrha bdellium thus terebinthina pix nigra ladanum styrax calamita benioinum stercus caprinum columbinum caninum bubulum aliae stercorum specie compound diaphoretickes oleum amygdalarum amararum juniperinum laurinum de leaded upon good charcole fire untill become thicke great part secret art consists manner limit boyling capitellum becomming thicke concreating salt must bee kept long upon fire untill moysture shall bee vanished spent heate thereof thus also force foresaid medicine also consists spirituous substance bee much dissipated weakened therefore come extreme drinesse shall taken fire wit yet shall thicke moysture remaine may hinder cautery made forme made cautery shall bee put glasse closely luted stopped ayre may dissolve shall laid kept dry place powder mercury neere cautery effect faculty thereof angelicall powder rom lb iii let bee powdred put retort large receiver well luted put thereto set retort fornace let distillation made first gentle fire increased little little receiver may waxe else sand ash water contained head shall waxe hot must draw forth put cold spirit may better condensed may fly away shall put long neckt receiver nose alembecke shall increase fire untill thing commeth wound trembling whole body faint small pulse palenesse face heart wounded cold sweate often swounding coldnesse extreame part suddaine death midriffe latines call diaphragma wounded patient midriffe feeleth great weight place raveth talketh idlely troubled shortnesse winde cough fit greevous paine drawing entralls upwards wherefore accident appeare may certainely pronounce death hand death appeareth sodainely wound hollow veine great arterie v great artery reason great violent evacuation blood spirit whereby function heart lung stopped hindred marrow backebone pierced patient assaulted palsie spinall marrow convulsion suddainely sence motion faileth part beneath excrement bladder either evacuated patient else altogether stopped liver wounded much blood commeth wound pricking paine disperseth selfe even unto swordlike gristle hath situation liver lower end brest bone called sternon blood falleth thence downe intestine doth oftentimes inferre maligne accident yea sometimes death stomacke wounded meate drink come wound stomacke followeth vomiting pure choler commeth sweating coldnesse extreame part therefore ought prognosticate death follow wound milt spleene wounded blacke grosse blood cometh spleene wound patient thirsty paine left side blood breakes forth belly putrifying causeth maligne greevous accident often time death follow gut wounded whole body griped pained excrement gut come wound whereat also often time gut breake forth great violence reines kidnyes wounded patient great paine making vrine blood commeth together therewith paine commeth kidneyes downe even unto groine yard testicle bladder vreters wounded paine goeth even unto entralls bladder part belonging groine distended vrine bloody made also commeth often time wound wombe wounded blood commeth privities accident appeare like bladder wounded womb sinewes pricked cut halfe asunder great paine affected nerve place followeth suddaine inflammation fluxe abscesse feaver convulsion oftentimes gangreene mortification part whereof commeth death unlesse speedily prevented declared signes token wounded part remaineth set downe signes certaine kindes death common naturall whereabout great strife contention made oftentimes determined ended judgement discreete physition chirurgion therefore chance nurse either drunkennesse negligence signes infant smothered overlayd lye upon infant lying bed stifle smother death judgement required whether infant dyed default negligence nurse violent suddaine disease lay hidden lurking body thereof shall finde truth matter signes following infant good health froward cry mouth nosethrills dead moystned bedewed certaine foame face pale violet purple colour body opened lung found swolne puffed certaine vaporous foame entralls following signes finde certainety hereof every body blasted striken lightning doth cast forth breathe signes slaine lightning unholsome stinking sulphureous smell birdes fowles ayre dogges touch much lesse prey feede part stricken often time sound without wound search well shall finde bone skinne bruised broken shivered peeces lightening hath pierced body making wound therein according judgement pliny wounded part farre colder rest body lightning driveth thinne fiery ayre lib cap striketh body great violence force whereof heate part soone dispersed wasted consumed lightening doth alwayes leave impression signe fire either ustion blacknesse lightning without fire moreover whereas living creature striken lightening fall contrary side onely man falleth affected side hee turned violence toward coast region whence lightening came man bee striken lightening asleepe hee found eye open contrarywise hee striken hee awake eye closed plinie writeth philip commines writeth bodyes stricken nation seene goe tent little lodging thicke little bee hive discovered succour fellowes throates cut like sheepe horseman likewise came part great gallop patati patata patati patapa ta ta patata patata arried well might bee throng stroakes imparted give receive men saw forced returned citty still fighting runne beaten backe artillery charged flint stone fouresquare peeces iron souldiers upon sayd wall made volley shot showred downe bullet upon like haile send backe lodging diver remained place combate also men come whole skinnes still remained tythe joyfull dye bed honour horse hurt flayed eaten souldiers steed beefe bacon fit must runne dresse hurt men dayes sallyes made much anger enemy let sleepe little safety monsieur de guise made warlike stratagem sent pesant none wisest two paire letter toward king gave ten crownes promised king give hundred provided gave letter one sent word enemy made signe retiring himselfe force made great breach hopt defend yea losing life within enemy well placed artillery certaine place named great difficulty kept entred seeing place weake citty hoped quickely fill againe sort cannot able enter one letter sowed lining doublet bid take heede told man also another given wherein sayd monsieur de guise sent word king beseiged hope well keepe citty matter cease speake made pesant goe forth night presently taken one stood sentinell carryed duke albe understand done citty asked letter sayd yes gave one seene put oath whether swore felt searcht found sowed doublet poore messenger hanged sayd letter communicated emperor caused counsell called resolved since could doe nothing first breach presently artillery drawne place thought weake made great attempt make another breach digd undermined wall endeavoured take tower hell yet durst come assault duke albe declared emperor souldiers dyed dayly yet number two hundred little hope enter citty seeing season great quantity souldiers emperor demanded people dyed gentleman remarke quality answeare made poore souldiers sayd make matter dye comparing caterpillers grashoppers eate buddes earth fashion would bee campe twelve shilling month therefore great harme dyed moreover sayd
